semantic_description: Ensure that all OTLP span events include the HTTP_REFERER and HTTP_RESPONSE_REDIRECT_LOCATION attributes so redirection paths can be traced and investigated.

attributes_to_add.name: http.referer

attributes_to_add.name: http.response.redirect_location
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'Location' header in the HTTP response
